[Damian Eke](https://www.nottingham.ac.uk/computerscience/people/damian.eke) is a colleague in the Faculty of Science (based in Comp Sci). He is a philosopher who works on Responsible Research and Innovation, Ethics and governance of AI and Neurotech, Data Ethics and governance and more.

He leads / co-leads on several projects including:

- the BRIDGE project (https://bridge.incf.org/) funded by Wellcome Trust 

- the African Brain Data Science Academy (https://africanbraindatanetwork.com/abds-academy/) funded by Kavli Foundation 

- STRATEGIC (https://www.strategic-project.org/) funded by European Commission under the EDCTP scheme 

RAISE (https://raise-project.uk/) funded by UKRI through the RAI-UK project (https://rai.ac.uk/)
